name: places/ChIJLyqh5I9YwokRK1lpSD-impo
formattedAddress: 277 West End Ave #1b, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 277 West End Ave #1b, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Have been going to this practice for years and always have a great experience.   The staff is friendly, there’s almost no wait to see the doctor, and they’re usually able to get you in quickly for follow ups.    Dr. Shea is wonderful - both for cosmetic procedures and routine derm. issues.  Always gives great (honest) recommendations when I ask about lasers or fillers and explains his treatment plans.    Highly recommend him and the practice in general.

originalText.text: I had a great experience from start to finish. The staff was friendly. and welcoming. I arrived early and Dr. Shea saw me right away. He has a great bedside manner. He made me feel so comfortable and respected. He's also very competent and professional and he addressed all my issues. I will be going back to see him!

text.text: I had a great experience from start to finish. The staff was friendly. and welcoming. I arrived early and Dr. Shea saw me right away. He has a great bedside manner. He made me feel so comfortable and respected. He's also very competent and professional and he addressed all my issues. I will be going back to see him!

originalText.text:
I recently had a remarkably positive experience during my visit to Upper West Dermatology, and I couldn't be more pleased. From the moment I walked in, it was evident that this clinic prioritizes patient comfort and satisfaction.

The cleanliness of the facility was impeccable. Equally impressive was the staff's friendliness and helpfulness. The receptionists greeted me with warm smiles and efficiently guided me through the paperwork.

Dr. Shea, my dermatologist, was a true standout. His compassionate and kind demeanor put me at ease throughout the examination. He took the time to listen to my concerns, explaining the diagnosis and treatment plan in a way that was both comprehensible and reassuring. This level of care and empathy made a potentially stressful appointment remarkably pleasant.

Overall, my experience here was exceptional. I'm grateful for the positive experience and would highly recommend this practice to anyone seeking dermatological care.

originalText.text:
I’m happy to have this chance to lavish well-deserved praise upon Dr Sarah Yagerman. I first went to her a few years ago with a tormenting skin condition. I’ve always been wary of the medical profession, and she was a happy surprise, a doctor who was clearly intelligent and knowledgeable with an engaging, friendly manner. She made me feel confident she would heal me, and under her skillful care my condition steadily improved. Recently I went back to her for another skin problem, more complex and debilitating, the cause of which was a mystery. Thanks to her patience and resourcefulness, I’m now almost fully recovered. I owe her a second debt of gratitude.

One of Dr Yagerman’s rare qualities is a keen sense of humor, making a visit with her a pleasant event. Another is her concern for a patient’s overall well-being. Her healing is more than skin deep, as it were. She creates a bond of comfort and reassurance by treating her patient as a person, not just a medical condition. She is the ideal physician, a graceful blending of expertise and empathy. I’m very fortunate to have found her.

originalText.text: Best doctor office experience I have EVER had! First, I was able to schedule an appointment for the day after I called, and the woman on the phone was delightful. When I arrived, I was seen so promptly that I did not even have time to fill out my forms! That's a FIRST! The doctor and his assistant were both lovely, helpful, and thorough, and the women at the front desk were so nice and friendly. I cannot recommend this practice enough
